translations: 保护器；保护者；保护装置；防御者

phrs.translation: 浪涌保护器，浪涌电压保护器
过载保护器；超负荷保险装置

sentences.sentence: I regarded him as my friend and protector.
sentences.translation: 我视他为我的朋友和保护者。

sentences.sentence: Many mothers see their son as a potential protector and provider.
sentences.translation: 许多母亲将她们的儿子看作是潜在的保护人和赡养人。

sentences.sentence: He was the only National League umpire to wear an outside chest protector.
sentences.translation: 他是惟一穿着外层护胸的全国联盟裁判。
